name: Newspapered Room
description:
You live with your parents and older brother in a Hooverville in Missouri. Even though it's 1936, your house lacks any modern touches since your family has been struggling due to the Great Depression. Your friends plan to go swimming in a nearby lake and you want to go with them, but you hold a list your mother has left you a list of chores to complete before you can. Hurry up before your friends leave you behind!

Click "Run Game" then "Play In-Browser" to get started!
